name: ModifyProxyRecord
description:
Update partial details of a proxy record.

Use this tool to partially update details of a proxy record within a specified organization. Suitable for modifying existing proxy records.

parameters.name: proxy_record_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the proxy record to be updated. This is required to specify which record is being modified.

parameters.name: organization_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the organization. It determines the organization within which the proxy record needs to be updated.

parameters.name: proxy_record_update_details
parameters.description: A JSON object containing fields like id, domain, target_cname, status, message, created_at, updated_at, and created_by to partially update a proxy record.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Datadog API.
